Kids Coding Camp
Thinking + Doding = Creating + Funny

LEARNING BY DOING

Kids Coding Camp helps from kids to teenagers understand fundamental programming basically. We are aiming to help young children experience charming side of programming, creativity without any old-school teaching methodology.


PRACTICE, PRACTICE, PRACTICE

After years of professional career, we realized the easiest and most efficient way of learning is PRACTICE. Programming is basically a training for brain and logic thinking, which helps the children for all future possibilities in career, in self-organization, in rational thinking. Kids Coding Camp wants to bring the learning programming though projects based, through more creativity ways. The children could create games, apps, websites, AI and more.


Curriculums

We have different groups for kids and teenagers. Kids will be trained specific for logic thinking and creativity though basic programming projects. Teenagers will focus on more real world programming language, which could be a basis starter for all possible futures.

Portfolio

About

I am graduate from top 5 University in China for Bachelor and top 5 Master in Europe for Computer Science.
After being more than 10 years professional programmer in Fortune 500, I would like also to bring the fantastic virtual world to young children.

"Leaning by Doing" is the magic motto for programming. After years of professional programming we realized the most efficient ways of training logic rational thinking is the PRACTICE. All curriculums will be based on one language and more focused on projects as well as creativity.

Kids Programming
(6 - 10 Years old)

We bring kids to fantastic programming world with Scratch, which is developed by MIT Media Lab. It consists of colored blocks, each representing a command. So you don't have to type every line yourself, the desired commands are simply dragged into the program.

Teenager Programming
(10 - 14 Years old)

For a further deeper perspective for programming, we will focus on a real world programming language - Javascript, which could be widely used for Web/Game/Mobile App and more. After the fundamental language knowledge it should be a relative good understanding for creativity with programming for all possible successful projects.

Project based leaning

We will provide basic languages concepts based on children ages. After quick learning phase, we will direct guide the children to build self creative projects using newly learned language.
